unit.utterance: maumwi-gabaw gaw galang manya tai mat ai la langai a lam
unit.utterance_translation: The title of this story is a story about a man who became a mad eagle.

unit.utterance: moi shawng e da ndai
unit.utterance_translation: Once upon a time, well,

unit.utterance: la lahkawng gaw shan lahkawng gaw ndai hkrun-lam hkawm ai
unit.utterance_translation: Two men, they went on a journey.

unit.utterance: bu hkawm ai i
unit.utterance_translation: They went on a journey, OK?

unit.utterance: hpaga ga hkawm ai
unit.utterance_translation: (They) went on a journey for trading.

unit.utterance: dai hku re na hkawm re yang she
unit.utterance_translation: They went on a journey like that and

unit.utterance: shan lahkawng gaw ndai mare langai mi kaw du
unit.utterance_translation: they two arrived at one village and

unit.utterance: mare langai hpang langai lai ai i
unit.utterance_translation: (they) passed one village after another, OK?

unit.utterance: dai hku re na hkawm na
unit.utterance_translation: (They) traveled like that and

unit.utterance: hpaga ga ai bungli galaw na she
unit.utterance_translation: (they) did the trading job and

unit.utterance: mare langai mi kaw du yang gaw
unit.utterance_translation: when (they) arrived at one village,

unit.utterance: mare dai kaw wa she masha kadai n-nga taw-nga ai da
unit.utterance_translation: no one lived in the village, it's said.

unit.utterance: masha kadai mung n-nga taw-nga ai
unit.utterance_translation: No one lived in the village.

unit.utterance: hpungkraw rai taw-nga ai
unit.utterance_translation: (It) was an empty village.

unit.utterance: hpungkraw rai taw-nga yang she dai
unit.utterance_translation: It was an empty village and

unit.utterance: dai shan lahkawng gaw
unit.utterance_translation: the two

unit.utterance: jan ma du mat sai
unit.utterance_translation: The sun set.

unit.utterance: hkring ma hkring ra sai
unit.utterance_translation: (They) had to take a rest.

unit.utterance: re yang she hkawm ma n-mai hkawm sai
unit.utterance_translation: Then, (they) could not continue their journey.

unit.utterance: re nga shan lahkawng gaw i hkau e dai na gaw ndai gaw hpungkraw she rai nga
unit.utterance_translation: Then, one of them said "Friend, tonight, this is a vacant village."

unit.utterance: nta-shakrang ni she rai taw-nga ai re jang gaw
unit.utterance_translation: "(This) is a spoiled house and

unit.utterance: an hkau gaw shara gaw an lahkawng tam la ra sai nga na tsun na she
unit.utterance_translation: we have to look for a place to stay," and

unit.utterance: ora langai mi gaw tsun ai
unit.utterance_translation: The other one said,

unit.utterance: ahkau sa dai nta-hpungkraw kaw gaw n-yup ga
unit.utterance_translation: "Friend, let's not stay at this vacant house."

unit.utterance: aw lupwa-kawng de wa yup ga nga tsun jang she
unit.utterance_translation: "Let's stay at the cemetery hill over there," (he) said and

unit.utterance: ora langai mi gaw koi nang mana-wa ai i
unit.utterance_translation: the other one said "No way, are you crazy?"

unit.utterance: dai lupwa-kawng de gaw grau hkrit na zawn-zawn re me.
unit.utterance_translation: "The cemetery hill looks more frightful."

unit.utterance: n re ai ndai lupwa kawng de gaw hpa n ra ai nga na she
unit.utterance_translation: "No, you don't need (to worry about) anything in this cemetery," (he) said and

unit.utterance: shi gaw ora de shi gaw wa yup nga yang
unit.utterance_translation: when he went and slept there

unit.utterance: ora langai mi gaw n-re law. lupwa-kawng de gaw hkrit-hpa le
unit.utterance_translation: the other one said "No, the cemetery hill is fearful."

unit.utterance: ndai nta kaw she yup ga
unit.utterance_translation: "Let's sleep at this vacant house."

unit.utterance: hpa n-ra ai nga tsun yang she
unit.utterance_translation: "This place is OK," (he) said and

unit.utterance: shan lahkawng gaw dangrang hkat ai
unit.utterance_translation: they two did not agree with each other.

unit.utterance: e rai sai
unit.utterance_translation: "OK."

unit.utterance: dai yang nang mung nang kam ai kaw yup u
unit.utterance_translation: "Then you also sleep where you are willing."

unit.utterance: ngai mung ngai kam ai kaw yup na
unit.utterance_translation: "I will also sleep at where I'm willing."

unit.utterance: hpawtde nhtoi san wa ai hte
unit.utterance_translation: "Tomorrow, when it gets bright,

unit.utterance: an lahkawng ndai kaw bai hkrum ga yaw nga na tsun dat ai.
unit.utterance_translation: let's meet here," (he) said.

unit.utterance: rai na she nang gara yang kaw yup na da aw nga na
unit.utterance_translation: Then, "Where will you sleep," (he) said and

unit.utterance: ora lupwa-kawng kaw wa yup ai hte seng na ngai ndai nta kaw yup na nga na tsun na
unit.utterance_translation: "As for your sleeping at the cemetery hill, I will sleep at this house," (he) said and

unit.utterance: e e rai sai nang ndai kaw yup nga u
unit.utterance_translation: "OK, OK, you sleep at here."

unit.utterance: ngai shawng du yang mung ngai nang hpe wa shaga la na yaw nga
unit.utterance_translation: "If I arrive here before you (tomorrow morning), I will call you," (he) said and

unit.utterance: ngai lawan-wan n-sa yang mung nang ndai kaw la nga yaw nga na tsun dat ai. rai di na she
unit.utterance_translation: "If I don't come earlier, wait here," (he) said. And then,

unit.utterance: ora langai mi gaw lupwa-kawng de she sa na
unit.utterance_translation: the other one went to the cemetery hill and

unit.utterance: shi gaw lup kaw du ai hte i
unit.utterance_translation: he arrived at a grave and, OK?

unit.utterance: shi gaw ndai lup langai mi hpe tsun ai
unit.utterance_translation: he said to the grave,

unit.utterance: ngai hpe daina naw makawp-maga la rit
unit.utterance_translation: "Please guard me tonight."

unit.utterance: ngai daina nang kaw manam na nngai
unit.utterance_translation: "I will stay here with you tonight."

unit.utterance: ngai ndai kaw naw yup na
unit.utterance_translation: "I will sleep here."

unit.utterance: ngai hpe naw makawp maga la rit nga na
unit.utterance_translation: "Guard me," (he) said and

unit.utterance: shi gaw dai hpe ga matan na
unit.utterance_translation: He prayed to it and

unit.utterance: shi gaw dai kaw yup ai.
unit.utterance_translation: he slept there.

unit.utterance: dai kaw yup na she ora langai mi gaw
unit.utterance_translation: (he) slept there and the other one

unit.utterance: shi gaw ora nta-hpungkraw kaw shang na she
unit.utterance_translation: he entered into the vacant house and

unit.utterance: yup taw-nga
unit.utterance_translation: (he) was sleeping.

unit.utterance: yup taw-nga re she
unit.utterance_translation: (He) was sleeping and

unit.utterance: hpang jahpawt nga yang htora
unit.utterance_translation: in the next morning

unit.utterance: htora lupwa kaw yup ai dai wa gaw dai kaw yup na she
unit.utterance_translation: the man who slept at the cemetery slept there and

unit.utterance: angwi-apyaw hte dai kaw yup la na le wa na she wa na
unit.utterance_translation: he slept there calmly and (he) came out of the cemetery and (he) returned (to the vacant house) and

unit.utterance: shi na manang-wa hpe sa shaga ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: (he) called his friend, it's said.

unit.utterance: sa shaga yang
unit.utterance_translation: (He) called (him) and

unit.utterance: n-le wa
unit.utterance_translation: (the other one) did not come out.

unit.utterance: rai yang shi gaw nta-nhku de shang na she
unit.utterance_translation: Then, he went inside the house and

unit.utterance: e hkau sa le
unit.utterance_translation: "Hey, friend, come here."

unit.utterance: hkawm sa-ga le
unit.utterance_translation: "Let's set off."

unit.utterance: ya mung naw yup taw-nga ai i
unit.utterance_translation: "Are (you) still sleeping?"

unit.utterance: hpabaw galaw taw-nga ai nga tsun she
unit.utterance_translation: "What are you doing?" (he) said and

unit.utterance: aw nta ntsa kaw na she baw langai mi galik-galik-galik nga na shi dai la wa na baw sha yu wa ai da
unit.utterance_translation: one head made a sound "galik, galik, galik" from above the house and the head of the man came down, it's said.

unit.utterance: baw langai sha yu wa yang she
unit.utterance_translation: Only one head came down and

unit.utterance: shi gaw hkrit na she
unit.utterance_translation: he was frightened and

unit.utterance: hprawng hprawng hprawng jang she
unit.utterance_translation: (he) ran, ran, ran, and

unit.utterance: dai la dai mung hpun dai le shi na baw-gaman sha hkan shachyut ai.
unit.utterance_translation: his head without the body chased (him).

unit.utterance: galik-galik e hkau ngai hpe naw la la rit
unit.utterance_translation: (Making a sound) "galik, galik" and "Hey, friend, wait for me."

unit.utterance: e hkau ngai hpe la la rit nga she
unit.utterance_translation: "Friend, wait for me," (he) said and

unit.utterance: dai baw sha kri na nat rai mat sai le i.
unit.utterance_translation: the head span and (it) became a spirit, OK?

unit.utterance: kri na she hkan shachyut hkan shachyut hkan shachyut re yang she
unit.utterance_translation: (The head) span and (it) chased (him) and

unit.utterance: dai la dai gaw jan mung du mat
unit.utterance_translation: the sun fell and the man

unit.utterance: ba mung ba
unit.utterance_translation: became tired and

unit.utterance: shat mung n-sha da ai le i
unit.utterance_translation: (he) did not eat any food, did he?

unit.utterance: shana de shi na shani tup atsam hte hprawng she
unit.utterance_translation: He was running away with his strength whole day and

unit.utterance: nau ba mat na she
unit.utterance_translation: (he) became too tired and

unit.utterance: jan mung du mat na she
unit.utterance_translation: the sun fell and

unit.utterance: shi gaw hpun ntsa de lung mat ai.
unit.utterance_translation: he climbed to the top of a tree.

unit.utterance: hpun ntsa lung mat jang
unit.utterance_translation: (he) climbed to the top of a tree and

unit.utterance: dai dai baw dai gaw hpun ntsa kaw hpun npu kaw le hkan lung na hku le.
unit.utterance_translation: the head, it followed and ascended to him from below, like that.

unit.utterance: galik-galik-galik-galik rai na dai hku byin taw-nga she
unit.utterance_translation: "Galik, galik, galik, galik," and (it) became like that and

unit.utterance: shi gaw hpun ntsa kaw lung mat ai.
unit.utterance_translation: he ascended to the top of the tree.

unit.utterance: hkrit na dai hku she
unit.utterance_translation: (he) was frightened and

unit.utterance: shi gaw dai kaw sha nga taw-nga yang
unit.utterance_translation: he only stayed there and

unit.utterance: gwi mung n gwi yu mat she
unit.utterance_translation: (he) did not dare to look (it) and

unit.utterance: shi gaw jan mung du shat mung kaw si ba mung ba myit mung myit htum mat ai.
unit.utterance_translation: the sun fell and he was hungry and (he) was tired and (he) was in distress.

unit.utterance: Dai majaw shi gaw e wa nga na hkrap ai
unit.utterance_translation: So, he said "Father," and cried.

unit.utterance: hkrap na e wa nga na
unit.utterance_translation: (He) cried and said "Father," and

unit.utterance: dai kaw hkrap na
unit.utterance_translation: (he) cried there and

unit.utterance: dai kaw dai hku dung na dung si mat ai.
unit.utterance_translation: he sat down there like that and died sitting there.

unit.utterance: re she dai kaw na shi gaw galang manya tai mat ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: Then, he became a mad eagle there.

unit.utterance: galang manya nga jang ndai manya ni gaw shi ya anhte mu ga ai kalang-lang na ai shaloi
unit.utterance_translation: Speaking for mad eagles, we have seen them and when (we) sometimes hear (them)

unit.utterance: wu-wa-wu-wa nga galang manya dai tai mat ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: (he) became a mad eagle screaming "Wu wa, wu wa."

unit.utterance: rai na dai kalang ya du hkra tim ndai galang manya ngoi ai hpun npu kaw guk-guk-guk nga ngoi ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: Then, until now, a sound "guk, guk, guk" comes out under the tree where the mad eagle makes a sound.

unit.utterance: dai gaw da dai shan lahkawng na lam re ai da.
unit.utterance_translation: This is the story of these two men.
